titleStmt.title: A display of heraldrie: manifesting a more easie access to the knowledge thereof then hath hitherto been published by any, through the benefit of method; / wherein it is now reduced by the study and industry of John Guillim ... Interlaced with much variety of history suitable to the severall occasions or subjects.
titleStmt.author: Guillim, John, 1565-1621.
Nower, Francis, d. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Jacob Blome,

notesStmt.note: Irregularity in paging: four un-numbered pages inserted between p. 402-403.
This item appears at reel 1358:27 incorrectly identified as Wing G2219, and at reel 2656:6 as Wing (2nd ed.) G2219A.
Imperfect: stained; copy at reel 1358:27 lacks dedicatory letter to William Seymour, Marquess and Earl of Hartford, and some pages bound and filmed out of order.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library, and Birmingham Central Reference Library (Birmingham, England).
